5ca550af-d285-4abb-9846-5b18e80d11a6.description: The deployment environment of the service
5ca550af-d285-4abb-9846-5b18e80d11a6.name: deployment.environment
5ca550af-d285-4abb-9846-5b18e80d11a6.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment.environment') AS `deployment.environment`
FROM signoz_metrics.time_series_v4_1day
WHERE (metric_name = 'signoz_calls_total') AND (unix_milli >= (toUnixTimestamp(now() - toIntervalDay(1)) * 1000))
GROUP BY `deployment.environment`

8acb5fe1-1b57-4787-8014-4741b2184214.description: The primary operations for the service are defined here. In a web API service, these are the API endpoints. For services that function as consumers, producers, or clients, these are the names of the entry-point spans.
8acb5fe1-1b57-4787-8014-4741b2184214.name: top_level_operation
8acb5fe1-1b57-4787-8014-4741b2184214.queryValue: SELECT name FROM signoz_traces.top_level_operations WHERE serviceName = $service.name GROUP BY name

d23168aa-b80c-4beb-83ce-96d4e7ba0719.description: The service.name value for the application
d23168aa-b80c-4beb-83ce-96d4e7ba0719.name: service.name
d23168aa-b80c-4beb-83ce-96d4e7ba0719.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'service.name') AS `service.name`
FROM signoz_metrics.time_series_v4_1day
WHERE (metric_name = 'signoz_calls_total') AND JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment.environment') = $deployment.environment AND (unix_milli >= (toUnixTimestamp(now() - toIntervalDay(1)) * 1000))
GROUP BY `service.name`
